glsa.title: Zabbix: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in Zabbix, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Zabbix is software for monitoring applications, networks, and servers.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Zabbix. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All Zabbix users should upgrade to the latest version:
